message: I was just trying to buy a few books online. I could not get real deals without checking prices on the most popular stores. That's a painful task. I used ISBNNETIN as base code and wrote a wrapper on top of it - http://cheapr.in/ - works only in India for now and searches 15 stores. Need your feedback.
Nice. But there are some errors too. See the fourth result http://cheapr.in/view?utf8=%E2%9C%93&q=Python&search_type=books&commit=Search
Is that a UTF8 char as a variable on a URL? :o That can cause you so much trouble… :s
